item.description:
Hopefully the rains will end and we can go to Quincy this weekend! I am coordinating with some of the other rockclimbing meetup groups and hopefully we will have a good turn out with several ropes set up. This is a good trip for those who haven't climbed outside before.

Please let me know if you can bring a rope and if you need can carpool.

I will have a red shirt, red shoes, a red chalk bag, and a visor. I plan to get there at 9 and set up a red rope on the Prow. The Prow is the tallest cliff. See you there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: By the cut of my jib.
item.name: Quincy Quarry - 3/20
